product_name: Thule Gutter Foot Pack - Set of 4
long_description: These tough, aerodynamic car rack mounts are designed to attach to cars with rain gutters. Provides a secure fit, even on car's with narrow rain gutter styles. Protective surfaces on rack prevent shifting and protect car's paint. Requires load bars, sold separately. Includes 4 heavy-duty, lockable knobs, which can be locked with Thule's lock cylinders, sold separately.
short_description: These tough, aerodynamic car rack mounts are designed to attach to cars with rain gutters.
